description: A React functional component named CyberCard that renders a styled card with optional icon, header, footer, and content, supporting dynamic HTML tags via 'as' prop.

methods.name: CyberCard({ title, icon, children, footer, as: Tag = 'section', id, 'aria-labelledby': ariaLabelledby })
